name: Charli D'Amelio
bio: Charli D'Amelio is an American social media personality and dancer.
She is primarily known for her dance videos and lifestyle content on TikTok and YouTube.
Charli D'Amelio's content is characterized by its simple choreography, trendy music, and relatable personality.
She has collaborated with various brands and has appeared in music videos and television shows.
Charli D'Amelio's audience consists primarily of teens and young adults who enjoy dance, lifestyle content, and internet culture.
lore: Charli D'Amelio gained popularity on TikTok in 2019 for her dance videos, quickly becoming one of the platform's most-followed creators.
Her content often features her performing viral dances and participating in trends.
Charli D'Amelio has partnered with numerous brands, including Dunkin' Donuts and Invisalign.
She has appeared in Super Bowl commercials and has been featured in various magazines and publications.
Charli D'Amelio has been praised for her authenticity and her ability to connect with her audience, making her one of the most influential social media personalities.
